# Environment files
.env
*.env

# Python
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo
*.pyd
*.pkl
*.rds

# Node
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Build and cache
dist/
build/
*.log

# VSCode / IDEs
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Secrets / Keys
*.pem
*.key
*.crt
*.cert
*.pfx
*.json

# Virtual environments
.venv/
env/
venv/
